IndexPage.title: Welcome!
IndexPage.teaser: Train right, see your performance, build a long life with quality
IndexPage.teaserDescription: S2Pro is a free App for you to train at the gym, at home, CrossFit space, parks, or wherever you want. You can create your own workout or use the ones we already have available in the app.
IndexPage.footerDescription: S2Pro is a technology and health company that seeks to strengthen the passions that make us healthier in every way of thinking and living through integral health.
IndexPage.bannerFooterText: Start tracking your progress right now!

about.missionDescription: S2Pro is a 100% personalized platform for online and in-person training for practitioners and non-practitioners of physical activity, personal trainers, studios, CrossFit boxes and gyms. An App with all the features of your daily training to strengthen your health in a practical and objective way.

benefitOne.title: Benefits
benefitOne.description: Complete with your training, exercises, training frequency, absence control, weight control, anamnesis based on Pollock 7 Dobras, among others.

items.title: Tangible results
items.desc: Days trained, weights lifted, exercises performed, among others

items.title: Constant news and tips
items.desc: Updated and relevant content for your training, nutrition and health tips

items.title: Personalized help
items.desc: Support for questions and suggestions with our physical education professionals

benefitTwo.title: Main Features
benefitTwo.description: Below are some of the app's main features.

items.title: Workout control
items.desc: At S2Pro you control your workouts in an easy and practical way

items.title: Workout statistics
items.desc: Data on weights lifted, days trained, exercises performed, among others

items.title: Intuitive videos
items.desc: At S2Pro you have example videos of each exercise

popupWidget.title: How can we help you?
popupWidget.subTitle: We'll respond within a few hours
popupWidget.name: Name
popupWidget.messageError: Error sending message, try again later

LastWorkouts.title: WORKOUTS!
LastWorkouts.subTitle: Recently created workouts
LastWorkouts.description: Below you can see the latest workouts created by our team of personal trainers and physical educators

FaqSection.title: FAQ
FaqSection.subTitle: Frequently Asked Questions
FaqSection.description: See below the most frequently asked questions about online and in-person training

questions.title: Is it possible to train without a personal trainer?
questions.desc: Yes, the App has all the exercises and training necessary for you to achieve your goals with explanatory videos and execution tips.

questions.title: Can I invite a personal trainer to create workouts for me?
questions.desc: Yes, the App has an area for personal trainers, where they can create workouts for their students and monitor their progress. With 1 click you send him the invitation.

questions.title: Does the App have absence control and training history?
questions.desc: Yes, the App has absence control and training history so you can monitor your progress in addition to anamnesis with Pollok 7 Dobras.

questions.title: Does the App have weight and measurement control?
questions.desc: Yes, the App has weight and measurement control so you can monitor your progress.

questions.title: Is it possible to train without a gym?
questions.desc: Yes, the App has workouts for those who want to train at home or outdoors.

questions.title: Does the App have power control?
questions.desc: No, the App does not have yet food control, but we have a blog with food and health tips.

PathnamesPage.title: Pathnames BR
PathnamesPage.description:
The pathnames are internationalized too.

If you're using the default language English, you'll see /en/pathnames in the browser address bar on this page.

If you change the locale to German, the URL is localized accordingly (/de/pfadnamen).

Error.title: Something went wrong!
Error.description:
We've unfortunately encountered an error.

You can try to reload the page you were visiting.

NotFoundPage.title: Page not found
NotFoundPage.description: Please double-check the browser address bar or use the navigation to go to a known page.
